column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Anytime I'm in a new city I like to try it's pizza
column2: and this did not disappoint. Great deep dish pizza
column3: with gluten free options if necessary. The only downside is the long wait
column4: but because the pizza is made to order
column5: it is to be expected with deep dish pizza. I would recommend leaving at least an hour and a half if ordering deep dish.
